channel.title: Editing mini maps? @#@#@@##@@#@##@#@#@@#@##@#
channel.description:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,633225.0.html
Currently using this source/client/cache.
Was trying to mess around with it, when I came to a sudden halt. Where are the mini maps stored?
====================================================================================== Before people comment "L2Search" and give me "let me google that for you" links... Save your time and leave. I need actual help and not redirects to a method I have already attempted, and got nothing from.
http://bit.ly/10uv6Bl ======================================================================================
Back on topic. Where are the minimap files stored? I'm guessing they are in the cache and stored as .dat files? How would I go about editing these?
In my case I would like to redo the map icons. Move them around / add new ones / remove a few. I'm fine working with firework/photoshop/flash.
Let me know if any of you have any answers :) Thanks in advance.

item.title: Editing mini maps? @#@#@@##@@#@##@#@#@@#@##@#
item.dc:creator: @wize_wizerd5 wize wizerd5
item.description:
@wize_wizerd5 wrote:

Host Gushers:

isn’t it done with a cache editor ?

From what I hear, yes it is =P

HcoJustin:

Object definitions hold a variable that tells the client which minimap icon to draw. The icons are stored in media.jag, and if you want to move them around you’ll want to edit the map itself to move those objects around.

Thanks for the info!

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:4, topic:520170”]The map icons are stored in media.jag in the cache. Use Tom’s cache suite. View/Edit Image Archives -> Media. Once you’re there, find the ‘mapfunction.dat’ file.

Oh, here are the Let me google that for you links.

Editing minimap icons:

lmgtfy.com

LMGTFY

LMGTFY

How to use Tom’s Cache Suite:

lmgtfy.com

LMGTFY

LMGTFY

Very plain and simple…[/quote]

Thanks for the information, I will try it out now.

Read full topic

@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

The map icons are stored in media.jag in the cache. Use Tom’s cache suite. View/Edit Image Archives -> Media. Once you’re there, find the ‘mapfunction.dat’ file.

Oh, here are the Let me google that for you links.

Editing minimap icons:

lmgtfy.com

LMGTFY

LMGTFY

How to use Tom’s Cache Suite:

Very plain and simple…

@HcoJustin wrote:

Object definitions hold a variable that tells the client which minimap icon to draw. The icons are stored in media.jag, and if you want to move them around you’ll want to edit the map itself to move those objects around.
